# Alcohol-Abuse

Alcohol Abuse - PH821

## Requirements

[Docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/) and [CWLTool](https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwltool#install)

## Configuration

Specify input dataset path in [Alcohol-Abuse-inputs.yml](Alcohol-Abuse-inputs.yml).

## Usage

Run: `cwltool Alcohol-Abuse.cwl Alcohol-Abuse-inputs.yml`

***

### Based on original definition developed by Kathryn M Abel, Holly Hope, Eleanor Swift, Rosa Parisi, Darren M Ashcroft, Kyriaki Kosidov, Semre Su Osam, Christian Dolman, Mathias Pierce
### Generated by [Phenoflow](https://kclhi.org/phenoflow).
